scripts.ng: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && ng
scripts.config:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config -- --environment=dev
scripts.config:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config -- --environment=prod
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && yarn build && ng serve
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && ng build
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:prod && yarn run build -- --prod --aot
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && ng test
scripts.test:coverage: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && rimraf coverage && yarn run test -- --code-coverage
scripts.lint: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && ng lint
scripts.lint:fix: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && ng lint ever-admin --fix
scripts.lint:styles: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && stylelint ./src/**/*.scss
scripts.lint:ci: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && yarn run lint && yarn run lint:styles
scripts.pree2e: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && webdriver-manager update --standalone false --gecko false
scripts.e2e: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && ng e2e
scripts.docs: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && compodoc -p src/tsconfig.app.json -d docs
scripts.docs:serve: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && compodoc -p src/tsconfig.app.json -d docs -s
scripts.release:changelog: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && yarn run conventional-changelog -- -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s
scripts.storybook: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && start-storybook -p 9001 -c .storybook
